00001 def front_elitist(oldPop, fronts):
00002     newPop = []
00003 
00004     popsize = len(oldPop)
00005     sols = 0
00006     i = 0
00007     while(sols <= popsize):
00008         sols = sols + len(fronts[i])
00009         i += 1
00010 
00011     newPop = []
00012     for k in range(i-1):
00013         for j in xrange(len(fronts[k])):
00014             newPop.append(fronts[k][j])
00015     n = popsize-len(newPop)
00016 
00017     if (n != 0):
00018         fronts[i-1].sort(lambda a,b: cmp(a.crowded_distance, b.crowded_distance))
00019         newPop.extend(fronts[i-1][-n:])
00020 
00021     return newPop
